item.description:
This volleyball event will be outdoors on a grass field. At least one net will be doubles, intended for A/AA players, and possibly reverse coed depending on the attendees. The other net will be either doubles, 4's, or 6's depending on the number of attendees. It may be reverse coed depending on the attendees. Please note in your RSVP if you have a preference for playing doubles or 4's/6's.

The doubles game will nominally using the ruleset listed in the first post on the following URL: http://volleyball.mee..., although generally it's up to the players to call their own faults.
item.name: Advanced Outdoor (Grass) Volleyball
